statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerDemandForecast WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_id, demand_quantity FROM CustomerDemandForecast WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT customer_id, inventory_level FROM CustomerDemandForecast WHERE demand_quantity > 100
SELECT customer_id, forecast_date, demand_quantity FROM CustomerDemandForecast ORDER BY forecast_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM CustomerDemandForecast
SELECT customer_id, demand_quantity, forecast_date FROM CustomerDemandForecast ORDER BY demand_quantity DESC, forecast_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM CustomerDemandForecast WHERE inventory_level < 50 ORDER BY forecast_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(demand_quantity) AS total_demand FROM CustomerDemandForecast GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_demand > 1000

SELECT customer_id, AVG(demand_quantity) AS average_demand, MAX(inventory_level) AS max_inventory FROM CustomerDemandForecast WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY average_demand DESC
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM CustomerDemandForecast WHERE demand_quantity > 500 ORDER BY customer_id ASC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email, customer_address FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, order_date, order_amount FROM orders;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 100;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_address LIKE '%Ave%';
SELECT customer_name, order_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE order_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, order_date FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, demand_forecast, forecast_date FROM customer_demand_forecast ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, inventory_count FROM inventory_management WHERE inventory_count > 100;
SELECT operation_id, customer_id, operation_type, operation_date FROM customer_service_operations WHERE operation_type = 'refund';
SELECT forecast_date, customer_id, demand_forecast FROM customer_demand_forecast WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT operation_id, customer_id, operation_type FROM customer_service_operations ORDER BY operation_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, demand_forecast, forecast_date FROM customer_demand_forecast ORDER BY demand_forecast DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_id, inventory_count FROM inventory_management WHERE inventory_count < 100 ORDER BY inventory_count ASC
SELECT customer_id, operation_type, operation_date FROM customer_service_operations WHERE operation_type = 'Complaint' ORDER BY operation_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, demand_forecast, forecast_date FROM customer_demand_forecast WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT * FROM customer_demand_forecast JOIN customer_service_operations USING (customer_id)
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, contact_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, product_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, contact_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, product_name, order_date FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_category='Electronics';
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT product_category FROM products;
SELECT customer_name, total_price FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM products WHERE product_price > 100;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY product_price ASC;
SELECT order_date, quantity, total_price FROM orders WHERE total_price < 500 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
